meanings.definition: A type of headwear worn by men in some Middle Eastern and South Asian cultures.
meanings.sent1: In the market, colorful turbans caught the eye of the shoppers.
meanings.sent2: The man proudly wore his turban to the cultural festival.
meanings.sent3: When the wind blew, the turban unraveled, causing laughter among the crowd.
meanings.sent4: His turban was a crown of tradition and honor.
meanings.sent5: The turban added a touch of elegance to his attire.

meanings.definition: A cloth wound around the head to form a headdress, worn chiefly by Sikhs and Muslims.
meanings.sent1: She carefully wrapped the soft fabric into a beautiful turban.
meanings.sent2: The turban shielded his head from the scorching sun.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten played with the loose end of the turban.
meanings.sent4: His turban was a symbol of his faith and identity.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns on the turban mesmerized onlookers.
